Hey everyone. I heard this rumor that that Sun is cooling down and will actually explode some time soon. So I'm thinking, how soon? Do you know anything?

 
 Who exactly did you hear this rumor from?
Nallyo

Do you realize how big the sun is and how long it would take to use up its fuel? Also, scientists have agreed that our sun will probably go with a whimper and not a bang. So instead of being worried about being fried, you should worry about being frozen ;)

Well I told you it was just a rumor.

Person
Nothing will happen to the sun in the near future. I'm not sure when it's supposed to use up its fuel, but it won't be in the next million years, so we have nothing to worry about.
jim's trucking

Hey everyone. I heard this rumor that that Sun is cooling down and will actually explode some time soon. So I'm thinking, how soon? Do you know anything?

 
 I wouldn't go out and buy any kind of survival kit right away. It'll be millions of years before our sun fails to warm us.
 
 We're more likely to destroy ourselves by pollution of the oceans or a nuclear winter than to die from extinction of the sun.
